Text:
I've followed the instructions. Installed this, then copy/replace SWF file from crack folder to installation folder. 
When I run it, always came to choices: (1) existing subscription, (2) trial 30 days.
Both ended with login form, in which I have to input email & password. 
What should I do, please explain, thank you in advanced.
I can confirm this defaults to trial..need a muse account which one must buy it seems..sad it is a good program
never even hoped for this, thank you very much
if it is in trail mode then why crack?
for those who figured it out, works with 2.3 too
@cata_simi69: please explain to us, how to figure it out, so that we can run Muse in non-trial mode. Thank you in advanced.
yes i am having the same problem.  i dont think this is crackable.  adobe wins.
